title: Integrated Education on Code Tracing Techniques Using an Intelligent Tutoring System

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational programming concepts and practical experience in social sectors
context.additional_context: Code tracing technology training to enhance digital competencies of social sector practitioners. Requires design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and explain the step-by-step execution flow of Python code.
Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy in tracking variable values in integrated code with compound conditionals and loops.
Learners can apply code tracing skills to solve problems in real-world social data processing scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
